scripts.build: npm run build:dev && npm run build:production
scripts.min: npm run min:dev && npm run min:production
scripts.min:dev: uglifyjs dist/system.src.js -cm --in-source-map dist/system.src.js.map --source-map dist/system.js.map --screw-ie8 --comments '/SystemJS v/' > dist/system.js
scripts.min:production: uglifyjs dist/system-production.src.js -cm --in-source-map dist/system-production.src.js.map --source-map dist/system-production.js.map --screw-ie8 --comments '/SystemJS v/' > dist/system-production.js
scripts.footprint: npm run footprint:dev && npm run footprint:production
scripts.test: npm run test:babel && npm run test:traceur && npm run test:typescript
